Define Documentation

#define CoreAssert ( x   )     Assert((x), #x, __FILE__, __LINE__ )

An assertion macro.

Will abort program execution if _condition is false. Also includes file and line numbers.

Parameters:
x The condition to validate.
See also:
Assert

Function Documentation

void Assert ( bool  _condition,
const char *  _testcase,
const char *  _file,
int  _line 
)

An assertion function.

Will abort program execution if _condition is false.

NOTE: To know what line and file your code failed in, use the CoreAssert macro instead!
Parameters:
_condition The result of the condition tested.
_testcase The condition that was validated.
_file The file _testcase is in.
_line The line in _file that _testcase is in.
See also:
CoreAssert

void GenerateBlackBox ( const char *  _msg  ) 

Creates a debug log on application failure.

Creates a file called "blackbox.txt" if the application fails an assertion.

NOTE: For internal use only.

void PrintStackTrace ( CrissCross::IO::CoreIO *  _outputBuffer  ) 

Prints a stack trace to _outputBuffer.

Parameters:
_outputBuffer The CoreIO output buffer to write to.
